back_translation_en: ‘Petro is driving the cow to the pasture.’

comms_internal: Alternative is the same verb with naACC.

This verb is different from other TR (NOM+ACC) verbs in that it can't passivize.

comms_internal: Preposition "у" is a variant of "в" used before "в-".
ALternative is "Петро здивувався із цього подарунка", but it is not very natural.
Dictionaries also suggest a reflexive verb, but consultants were reluctant to use it.

comms_internal: Alternative is "Петро дратується через свою дочку".
